summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the parking garage located between Sixth and Seventh Avenues and Pine and Olive Streets in downtown Seattle; establishing the Parking Garage Operations Fund with regard to that garage; assigning responsibility for operation of that garage to the Executive Services Department; authorizing an amendment to the Condominium Declaration relating to that garage; and authorizing waiver of certain terms in the Umbrella and Parking Agreements relating to that garage.
